Producer: Ibón Cormenzana, Jérôme Vidal, Pablo Berger
Production Co: arte France Cinéma, The Kraken Films, Arcadia Motion Pictures, Sisifo Films, Nix Films, Noodles Production
Synopsis: Rescued from her evil stepmother (Maribel Verdú) by dwarves, a young woman (Macarena García) becomes a bullfighter like her late father.
Title: Blancanieves
